name: sharepoint-choice
description: SharePoint driven multi choice and form fields

scripts.version: npx -y shx sed -i "s/\"peerDependencies\":/\"dependencies\":/" package.json && npx -y npm-check-updates -u && npx -y shx sed -i "s/\"dependencies\":/\"peerDependencies\":/" package.json && npx -y shx rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --ignore-scripts && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Version bump" && git push

author: HuwSy
